abilities.name: Lord of Murder
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **WORLD EATERS INFANTRY** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Devastating Assault
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, its hellforged weapons have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.

abilities.name: Direct the Slaughter
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one model from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly **WORLD EATERS** unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.
